title: Drive-in-Theatres, cinema or theatres, subject to provisions of the Maharashtra Cinemas (Regulation)
clause_text: Drive-in-Theatres, cinema or theatres, subject to provisions of the Maharashtra Cinemas (Regulation) Act, Highway amenities as permitted in Agriculture zone with FSI at par with Industrial zone, Information Technology Establishments. (IT / ITES),
